title: 3v3 ranked teams icon?
body: Seems relatively unfair that we have no way of gaining the icon. Couldnt we have it added the same as our team 5v5 icon or something like the sorts?

replies.body: Would love Ranked 3v3... It's hard to get 5 people on to play ranked as people have different schedules.
i agree, 3v3 is probably the nicest looking icon as well and our whole server misses out :(
